short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks distractions and helps you focus online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Zen Mode is a Chrome extension that enhances your viewing experience by removing distractions on YouTube. It hides video recommendations and comments, and provides a cleaner interface on the homepage, showing only the search bar. This allows users to focus more on the content they are interested in without being sidetracked.
